Actually when I used http://localhost.archive.org:8080 and give a url of a
page I archived, it shows me the version of pages which I have archived.
But when I use http://localhost:8080 and give the url, it says HTTP 404
resource not found.

When accessing using public ip, I can access wayback page via,
http://publicip:8080. Bu the HTTP 404 error comes when I try to click
on the Take me
Back button.

I have attached the wayback.xml here.

--f46d04428896d6a87204e0d2c4ad
